description: DEVELOPMENT OF AN INDEPENDENT NATIONAL PUBLIC BROADCASTING SERVICE FOR SIERRA LEONE

subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description: The primary purpose of this project is to provide for initial support to the establishment and operations of the SLBC while the resource/revenue mobilization capacity of the SLBC is being developed for self-sustainability.  The objective of the project is to assist the SLBC to firmly establish itself as a public service broadcaster in Sierra Leone that will contribute to peace building, democracy, human rights, reconciliation, development, and empowerment of the people.
donor_long: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
subproject.title: INDEPENDENT BROADCASTING STATI

subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description:
-The Board of Trustees trained to operate in an independent and responsible manner, and to provide effective oversight of SLBC management with clear policies and a full understanding of their role as a public service broadcaster 
-The management and staff of SLBC are trained to be basically competent in their respective jobs and have a clear understanding of a public service broadcaster
-Detailed strategic plans developed for generating income and resources mobilized to realize the plans
-SLBC has the facilities it needs to provide regular and reliable programming
subproject.title: INDEPENDENT BROADCASTING(II)

subproject.corporate outcome: Legislatures, regional elected bodies, and local assemblies have strengthened institutional capacity, enabling them to represent their constituents more effectively
subproject.description:
-The Board of Trustees trained to operate in an independent and responsible manner, and to provide effective oversight of SLBC management with clear policies and a full understanding of their role as a public service broadcaster 
-The management and staff of SLBC are trained to be basically competent in their respective jobs and have a clear understanding of a public service broadcaster
-Detailed strategic plans developed for generating income and resources mobilized to realize the plans
-SLBC has the facilities it needs to provide regular and reliable programming
subproject.title: INDEPENDENT BROADCASTING(II)

subproject.corporate outcome: Legislatures, regional elected bodies, and local assemblies have strengthened institutional capacity, enabling them to represent their constituents more effectively
subproject.description:
-Strengthened public service ethos through programming that inform, educate and entertain the people
-Strategic planning completed for coverage towards 2012 elections
-Initial operational support provided to SLBC to operate reliably, providing daily unbiased and independent news and current affairs programmes, relevant information and development programs, and entertainment and sports programmes on radio
-Consistency of technical quality of SLBC output ensured and maximum reach among the total population achieved
subproject.title: INDEPENDENT NATIONAL  BROADCAS

title: PBF-INDEPENDENT BROADCASTING STATION
